attributes.action: Make The Inheritance Tax A Fairer System.
attributes.additional_details: After seeing a couple of family members trying to alter their whole lives in order to not give in to the Inheritance Tax, I would love to see a change in the Inheritance Tax system.
attributes.background: I would like to see the Inheritance Tax made in a more just way or to be scrapped all together. This would provide an easier life for those at the end of their lives and would provide less worry for all.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We're not sure exactly what changes you'd like to see. 

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
